txt.en: Ostasänt can be found in Sûri-kylä.\n\nYou should speak with Ostasänt.
Roving Threat: Krevchal, the Brutal Chieftain
Evil stirs in the Northern realm, including Krevchal, who leads his Gauradan tribe on violent rampages around the ice bay.
Krevchal can be found somewhere in Forochel.\n\nYou should defeat Krevchal.

'The Gauradan Chieftain known as Krevchal, is on the move.

'His tribe has already murdered many Lossoth over the years. Now that he is out in the open, it is our time to strike.

'I wonder if his movements are connected to these foul winds from the East.'
'You have done a great deed for the Lossoth. Something dark angers the Gauradan spirits. May Sûri-kylä be spared or be able to defend itself. We shall be ever watchful.'
